news.title: 巴黎检方突袭马斯克旗下X公司法国办公室
news.title0: Paris prosecutors raid France offices of Elon Musk's X
news.content: 法国巴黎检方突袭了埃隆·马斯克旗下社交媒体平台X在法国的办公室，调查其算法和推荐内容是否合规。
news.content0: Offices belonging to Elon Musk's social media platform, X, in France are being raided by the Paris prosecutor.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 克林顿夫妇同意就爱泼斯坦案赴国会作证
news.title0: Clintons agree to testify on Epstein as vote looms to hold them in contempt of Congress
news.content: 美国前总统比尔·克林顿及前国务卿希拉里同意就爱泼斯坦案赴国会作证，此前国会正考虑以藐视国会罪起诉二人。
news.content0: Former US President Bill Clinton and his wife Hillary Clinton, the former Secretary of State, have agreed to testify in the congressional investigation into late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 特朗普向哈佛大学索赔10亿美元
news.title0: Trump seeks $1bn in damages from Harvard
news.content: 美国总统特朗普宣布，将就其政府与哈佛大学的持续争端，向该校索赔10亿美元。
news.content0: Donald Trump announced he will be seeking $1bn (£730m) in damages from Harvard University in his administration's ongoing feud with the institution.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 挪威王储之子强奸案开审，王室陷丑闻
news.title0: Rape trial begins for son of Norway's crown princess in tense moment for royal family
news.content: 挪威王储之子马里乌斯·博格·霍伊比因涉嫌强奸等38项指控出庭受审，其母王储妃亦卷入爱泼斯坦丑闻。
news.content0: A year and a half after Marius Borg Høiby was arrested by police over a violent episode at a woman's flat's in Oslo, the son of Norway's crown princess has gone on trial, in the biggest case to come to court here for years.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美国知名主播母亲疑似遭绑架
news.title0: NBC anchor Savannah Guthrie's mother has been abducted, sheriff suspects
news.content: 美国NBC新闻主播萨凡纳·格思里的84岁母亲在家中失踪，警方怀疑其遭绑架，FBI介入调查。
news.content0: The mother of US news anchor Savannah Guthrie has been abducted and "didn't go willingly" from her home, Arizona law enforcement officials suspect.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 英国15岁少年承认谋杀12岁学童
news.title0: Teen admits murdering schoolboy, 12, on walk home
news.content: 英国一名15岁少年承认去年在伯明翰谋杀一名12岁学童，并承认袭击三名老年妇女等多项罪名。
news.content0: A 15-year-old boy has pleaded guilty to murdering 12-year-old Leo Ross as he walked home from school in Birmingham last year.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 马斯克SpaceX收购其AI公司xAI
news.title0: Elon Musk’s SpaceX acquires xAI, merging his two most ambitious companies
news.content: 埃隆·马斯克的SpaceX宣布收购其人工智能公司xAI，合并后将成为全球估值最高的私人公司。
news.content0: SpaceX has acquiredxAI, the company announced on Monday, merging two of Elon Musk’s most ambitious companies into the most valuable private company in the world.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 特朗普与哥伦比亚总统将举行关键会晤
news.title0: From clash to dialogue: Petro arrives in Washington for key encounter with Trump after year of tensions
news.content: 哥伦比亚总统佩特罗将赴华盛顿与特朗普会面，试图缓和两国持续一年的紧张关系与贸易争端。
news.content0: After a year of insults, threats, tariffs and sanctions, the leaders of the US and Colombia will meet in Washington on Tuesday in an apparent attempt to put their bitter feud behind them.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 南极冰川科考任务在最后一步失败
news.title0: Deep Inside an Antarctic Glacier, a Mission Collapses at Its Final Step
news.content: 一项在南极思韦茨冰川安装监测设备的科考任务在最后阶段失败，设备被半英里厚的冰层困住。
news.content0: A daring attempt to study Antarctica’s fast-melting Thwaites Glacier collapsed over the weekend after the scientists’ instruments became entombed within the half-mile-thick ice.
news.author: NYTimes
